name: Smolest Summer Film
description: Smolest Summer Film is a short film dedicated to the smol movement. During summer, at the beach many of us have found ourselves taking part in all sorts of games. Two of my friends that summer of 2017 decided to make a balance sculpture out of pebbles and rocks from the beach we were. As most of the times, these towers fall easily due to imbalance. Such is the case here and ending the smolest summer smol film. Simple occcation, photographed by me on the summer of 2017 and made into animated GIF "smol" movie.
